name: This is how i remember it
description:
"This is how I remember it" displays stories of our past that keep coming back to mind. Those that you are trying to remember or that come in flashes, eaten by the background noise of the mind, erased without delay by an abstract composition. 
——
The figures that appear when you interact with the piece were created for architecture simulations. They carry this somewhat eerie narrative one finds in such simulations: somewhere between utopia and down-to-earth reality. They produce this weird – almost sterile – form empathy, attached to the least controversial of our memories, the stuff that's just above the surface.
——
(Figures by Isometric Architecture)
